title: 2.7 Under Persia: Farewell to the Tanakh
itunes:title: Under Persia: Farewell to the Tanakh
description: The Jews have a placid existence under Persian rule, and create Judaism. They reconstruct their religion, one now without kings and prophets. From on, the Law is all. I discuss the last of the books of the Tanakh: the romances of Esther and Judith, the hateful but mercifully brief prophet Obadiah, and the funniest book in the canon, Jonah.
